descriptionHtml:
Everyone loves Pinup Poser by Halofarm.  As I play I come up to situations that can be a great photo op and either I cant remember which number is my favorite pose or just end up rumaging through all of them which takes forever. So I just took pics of each pose with a reference number to each on the Idle lists. so now you can have pics to look through for your photo ops which makes it super fast to pose your characters.

Extraction:
Make sure to extract as folders, cause the pictures are seperated by folders describing each Idle pose.

Example:
pictures have names like 2-10.jpg , the first number is the pose group and the second number is the pose under that group.

Hope this makes sense lol 

And big thanks to Halofarm for Pinup Poser.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17174

Enjoy your faster posing
author: Alpha-Skull
